pages.text: Unfortunately, $(l:age5#fleroviumore)Flerovium Ore$(/l) is challenging to find, thanks to it being in the seabeds of the $(d)Chaos Plane$() Dark Energy oceans. Thankfully, you can make $(item)Chaotic Reduction Goggles,$() an item that will increase visibility in Dark Energy.

Combine a $(item)Glowstone Dust$() and a $(l:age5#prismrose)Prism Rose$(/l) in an Alloy Smelter, and you will get a $(6)Bright Prism Rose.$() This is just like a Prism Rose, but glows very brightly when placed.
